column3: This review is approved. Once all reviews are approved, then the permit will be ready to issue.
See the attached conditions of approval. This review is approved if the applicant agrees to meet these conditions. Once all reviews are approved, then the permit will be ready to issue.
Plan review resulted in comments. Plan addressing the comments must be submitted for further review.
The submittal was not complete, so a full plan review was impossible. Submit all of the required documents for the scope of work.
A partial submittal was reviewed and approved. There are additional documents that must be submitted to complete the review.
